attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fuel prices now are (approx):

Diesel: 95.9p per L
Red diesel: 54.9p per L

same fuel just one with more tax than the other.


the government should scrap the "dole" benifits, and stop giving forigners homes!
